The Quranic researcher is that of the Qur’an, with the saying of a dominant Satan, that is, by saying some of the hearing because it is that it is the one who is translated, and it is a denial of their saying.Where are you going to be the same as they will be in the matter of the great Qur’an as your saying to your serious, gravity in the structures of the way: where are you doing?And the fulfillment of the formation of what is after it on the appearance that it is alive.
